document_data.mainbody: 'Ravia''' ({{Pronounce|rah|VEE|uh|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Embers of Elmwood|28}}}}) was a member of the [[Cult of the Eternal Fire]] in the [[Moonsea]].
document_data.Personality: Ravia was a cruel and pernicious individual, and believed that she couldn't be stopped. She delighted in cruelly taunting others for their wasted efforts.{{Cite adventurers league/Embers of Elmwood|18}}
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Ravia was ordered by her master to deliver a "[[devastation's orb]]" to the cult's chapter in [[Mulmaster]]. However, during a stop in [[Elmwood]], the orb spontaneously detonated, razing the village. The only survivor was Ravia, who was kept in custody first by Mulmaster's [[City Watch (Mulmaster)|City Watch]] and then by [[Rosealine Culkin|Zora Rosealine Culkin]], owner of the village.{{Cite adventurers league/Embers of Elmwood|18}}
